entity.name: course
entity.query: select distinct c.id, 'course' as type, c.name, c.detail, c.code, c.collegeId, (select IFNULL(min( s.startDate ), IF(cc.isDistantLearningCourse=1, CURDATE(), CONVERT_TZ(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 100 YEAR),'GMT','GMT') )) from CourseClass cc left join Session s on s.courseClassId=cc.id left join Room ro on cc.roomId=ro.id left join Site si on ro.siteId=si.id left join College co on cc.collegeId=co.id inner join ( select cc1.id, count(s1.id) as cnt from CourseClass cc1 inner join Session s1 on s1.courseClassId=cc1.id where cc1.isWebVisible=1 and cc1.isCancelled=0 and s1.startDate > CURDATE() group by cc1.id having cnt > 0 union select cc3.id, 1 as cnt from CourseClass cc3 where cc3.isWebVisible=1 and cc3.isCancelled=0 and cc3.isDistantLearningCourse=1) as cc2 on cc2.id=cc.id where cc.courseId=c.id) as startDate from Course c where c.isWebVisible=1
entity.deltaImportQuery: select distinct c.id, 'course' as type, c.name, c.detail, c.code, c.collegeId, (select IFNULL(min( s.startDate ), IF(cc.isDistantLearningCourse=1, CURDATE(), CONVERT_TZ(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 100 YEAR),'GMT','GMT') )) from CourseClass cc left join Session s on s.courseClassId=cc.id left join Room ro on cc.roomId=ro.id left join Site si on ro.siteId=si.id left join College co on cc.collegeId=co.id inner join ( select cc1.id, count(s1.id) as cnt from CourseClass cc1 inner join Session s1 on s1.courseClassId=cc1.id where cc1.isWebVisible=1 and cc1.isCancelled=0 and s1.startDate > CURDATE() group by cc1.id having cnt > 0 union select cc3.id, 1 as cnt from CourseClass cc3 where cc3.isWebVisible=1 and cc3.isCancelled=0 and cc3.isDistantLearningCourse=1) as cc2 on cc2.id=cc.id where cc.courseId=c.id) as startDate from Course c where c.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select c.id from Course c where c.isWebVisible=1 and c.modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: courseClass
entity.query: select distinct cc.id as id, cc.feeExGst as pr, cc.code as code, IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.endDate,'GMT',cc.timeZone),IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.endDate,'GMT',se.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.endDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(cc.endDate,'GMT', co.timeZone)))), CONVERT_TZ(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 100 YEAR),'GMT','GMT') ) as end, IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.startDate,'GMT',cc.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.startDate,'GMT',se.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.startDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(cc.startDate,'GMT', co.timeZone)))), CURDATE()) as start from CourseClass cc left join Session se on se.courseClassId=cc.id left join Room ro on cc.roomId=ro.id left join Site si on ro.siteId=si.id left join College co on cc.collegeId=co.id where cc.isWebVisible=1 and cc.courseid='${course.id}' and cc.isCancelled=0 and ((cc.endDate > CURDATE() and cc.isDistantLearningCourse=0) or cc.isDistantLearningCourse=1)
entity.deltaImportQuery: select distinct cc.id as id, cc.feeExGst as pr, cc.code as code, IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.endDate,'GMT',cc.timeZone),IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.endDate,'GMT',se.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.endDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(cc.endDate,'GMT', co.timeZone)))), CONVERT_TZ(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 100 YEAR),'GMT','GMT') ) as end, IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.startDate,'GMT',cc.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.startDate,'GMT',se.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(cc.startDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(cc.startDate,'GMT', co.timeZone)))), CURDATE()) as start from CourseClass cc left join Session se on se.courseClassId=cc.id left join Room ro on cc.roomId=ro.id left join Site si on ro.siteId=si.id left join College co on cc.collegeId=co.id where cc.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select id from CourseClass where isWebVisible=1 and modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' or endDate < NOW()
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select id from Course where id='{courseClass.courseId}'
entity.deletedPkQuery: select id from CourseClass where endDate < NOW()

entity.name: contact
entity.query: select ct.id as id, ct.givenName as gvName, ct.familyName as fmName from Contact ct inner join Tutor t on ct.tutorId = t.id inner join TutorRole tr on t.id = tr.tutorId where tr.courseClassId='${courseClass.id}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: select ct.id as id, ct.givenName as gvName, ct.familyName as fmName from Contact ct where ct.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select ct.id from Contact ct where ct.modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select cc.id from Contact ct inner join Tutor t on ct.tutorId = t.id inner join TutorRole tr on t.id = tr.tutorId inner join CourseClass cc on tr.courseClassId = cc.id where ct.id='${contact.id}'

entity.name: course_session
entity.query: select distinct lower(dayname(IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT',s.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', co.timeZone))),s.startDate))) as dayName, IF(DAYOFWEEK(IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT',s.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', co.timeZone))),s.startDate)) in (1,7), 'weekend', 'weekday') as dayType, IF(HOUR(IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT',s.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', co.timeZone))),s.startDate)) > 6 and HOUR(IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT',s.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', co.timeZone))),s.startDate)) < 17, 'daytime', 'evening') as time from Session s left join CourseClass cc on s.courseClassId=cc.id left join Room ro on cc.roomId=ro.id left join Site si on ro.siteId=si.id left join College co on cc.collegeId=co.id where s.courseClassId='${courseClass.id}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: select distinct lower(dayname(IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT',s.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', co.timeZone))),s.startDate))) as dayName, IF(DAYOFWEEK(IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT',s.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', co.timeZone))),s.startDate)) in (1,7), 'weekend', 'weekday') as dayType, IF(HOUR(IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT',s.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', co.timeZone))),s.startDate)) > 6 and HOUR(IFNULL(IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT',s.timeZone), IFNULL(CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', si.timeZone), CONVERT_TZ(s.startDate,'GMT', co.timeZone))),s.startDate)) < 17, 'daytime', 'evening') as time from Session s left join CourseClass cc on s.courseClassId=cc.id left join Room ro on cc.roomId=ro.id left join Site si on ro.siteId=si.id left join College co on cc.collegeId=co.id where s.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select id from Session where modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select cc.id as id from Session s inner join CourseClass cc on s.courseClassId = cc.id where s.id='${course_session.id}'

entity.name: site
entity.query: select s.id as id, s.suburb as sb, s.postcode as pc, lower(CONCAT(s.suburb, ' ', s.postcode)) as subpost, CONCAT(CAST(s.latitude AS CHAR), ',', CAST(s.longitude AS CHAR)) as loc from Site s inner join Room r on r.siteId=s.id inner join CourseClass cc on cc.roomId=r.id where s.isWebVisible=1 and cc.id='${courseClass.id}' group by s.suburb, s.postcode union select s.id as id, s.suburb as sb, s.postcode as pc, lower(CONCAT(s.suburb, ' ', s.postcode)) as subpost, CONCAT(CAST(s.latitude AS CHAR), ',', CAST(s.longitude AS CHAR)) as loc from Site s inner join Room r on r.siteId=s.id inner join Session ss on ss.roomId=r.id inner join CourseClass cc on cc.id=ss.courseClassId where s.isWebVisible=1 and cc.id='${courseClass.id}' group by s.suburb, s.postcode
entity.deltaImportQuery: select s.id as id, s.suburb as sb, s.postcode as pc, lower(CONCAT(s.suburb, ' ', s.postcode)) as subpost, CONCAT(CAST(s.latitude AS CHAR), ',', CAST(s.longitude AS CHAR)) as loc from Site s where s.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select id from Site where isWebVisible=1 and modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select cc.id from Site s inner join Room r on r.siteId=s.id inner join CourseClass cc on cc.roomId=r.id where s.id='${site.id}' union select cc.id from Site s inner join Room r on r.siteId=s.id inner join Session ss on ss.roomId=r.id inner join CourseClass cc on cc.id=ss.courseClassId where s.id='${site.id}'

entity.name: coursetag
entity.query: select distinct t.id as id, t.id as tagId from Tag t inner join TaggableTag tgt on tgt.tagId=t.id inner join Taggable tg on tgt.taggableId = tg.id where t.isWebVisible=1 and tg.entityIdentifier = 'Course' and tg.entityWillowId = '${course.id}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: select distinct t.id as id, t.id as tagId from Tag t where t.id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select distinct t.id as id from Tag t inner join TaggableTag tgt on tgt.tagId=t.id inner join Taggable tg on tgt.taggableId = tg.id where t.isWebVisible=1 and tg.entityIdentifier = 'Course' and t.modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' or tgt.modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}' or tg.modified > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
entity.parentDeltaQuery: select distinct tg.id as id from Tag t inner join TaggableTag tgt on tgt.tagId=t.id inner join Taggable tg on tgt.taggableId = tg.id where t.id=${coursetag.id}
